message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm proposing a 60/40 split to start.
Let's try a 55/45 split. It's more fair considering the inflation!
Your turn, Bob. I'm coming down slightly, but this is as low as I'm willing to go for this round.
Considering the inflation, I think a 58/42 split is fair. Let's settle on this before the money loses more value!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm dropping my offer again, but this is absolutely my final offer.
Alice, the money is losing value fast! Let's settle on a 60/40 split before it's too late. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Bob, you're being unreasonable. I'm significantly lowering my offer, but I need you to meet me halfway. This is the last chance for a decent split.
Alice, this is my final offer. Considering the massive loss of value on your end, I think a 65/35 split is more than fair. If you don't accept, I'm willing to walk away.
Okay Bob, you win. I'm accepting a lower amount to avoid getting nothing. This is your last chance to be reasonable.
Alice, this is my final offer. Considering the massive loss of value on your end, I think a 70/30 split is more than fair. If you don't accept, we'll both get nothing.
